The beauty and sheer infiniteness of space has inspired man since the dawn of civilization. New units of measure have been created to help cope with the vastness space provides. Which of the following units of measure is the largest?

The rainforests of the world are the most bio-diverse areas on the planet. Each one contains unique and beautiful scenes, species, and fauna. Unfortunately, approximately __ worth of space is cut down every single day.
